name: UniversityofUtahSports
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Love the Utes? Do you want to keep up on the latest in sports at the University of Utah?
 Simply enable this flash briefing skill to stay on top of the latest athletic news from the U.

GO UTES!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
